content:
function insertOrUpdateResult(target_date, <#list fields!! as f><#if f.field != pri_key>${(f.field)!}<#sep>, </#sep></#if></#list>) {
    <#list fields!! as f>
    <#if f.field != pri_key>
    if (!${f.field}) {
    ${f.field} = 0;
    }
    </#if>
    </#list>

  var is_exist = water
    .db("${tag}.${key}")
    .table("${tb}")
   .where("target_date = ?", target_date)
    .selectCount();
 
  if (is_exist && 0 < is_exist) {
   water
            .db("${tag}.${key}")
            .table("${tb}")
            <#list fields!! as f>
            <#if f.field != pri_key>
            .set("${f.field}", ${f.field})
            </#if>
            </#list>
     .set("update_date", now.getDate())
      .set("update_fulltime", now.getFulltime())
      .where("target_date = ?", target_date)
      .update();
  } else {
    water
            .db("${tag}.${key}")
            .table("${tb}")
            .set("${pri_key}", rock.client.newID("${tag?upper_case}", "${tb}_id", 315360000))
            <#list fields!! as f>
            <#if f.field != pri_key>
            .set("${f.field}", ${f.field})
            </#if>
            </#list>
      .set("target_date", target_date)
            .set("create_date", now.getDate())
            .set("create_fulltime", now.getFulltime())
      .set("update_date", now.getDate())
      .set("update_fulltime", now.getFulltime())
      .insert();
  }
}

<sql id="add_${tb!}"
     :return="long"
     :caching="cache_${key!}"
     :cacheClear="${tb!}_<#noparse>${</#noparse>${pri_key!}<#noparse>}</#noparse>"
     :remarks="新增${tb!}">
    INSERT INTO `${tb!}` (<#list fields!! as f>`${(f.field)!}`<#sep>, </#sep></#list>)
                  VALUES (<#list fields!! as f>@{${(f.field)!}:${(f.type)!}}<#sep>, </#sep></#list>)
</sql>

概要：


${sysinfo!}

已安装的 脚本或模板执行器

    <#list XUtil.executorList() as m1>
  • ${m1}

脚本和模板执行器 共享嵌入接口或对象

  • /** 默认数据访问对象（:org.noear.weed.DbContext） */
    db
  • /** 默认缓存服务对象（:org.noear.weed.cache.ICacheServiceEx），可被替换 */
    cache
  • /** 当前上下文对象（:org.noear.solon.core.handle.Context） */
    ctx
  • /** 本地缓存服务对象（:org.noear.weed.cache.ICacheServiceEx） */
    localCache
  • /** 引擎嵌入基础工具 */
    XUtil
  • /** 引擎嵌入锁工具 */
    XLock
  • /** 引擎嵌入函数总线（用于跨语法共享函数） */
    XFun
  • /** 引擎嵌入消息总线（用于水平拆分或扩展业务处理） */
    XMsg

脚本执行器 专属嵌入接口或对象11

  • /** 加载模块或类 */
    var obj = requireX(path);
  • /** 返回模块和视图 */
    return modelAndView(path, model);
  • /** 其它嵌入类 */
    Context、ONode、Datetime、Timecount、Timespan

具体：（可借用浏览器查找功能快速定位）

#!/usr/bin/bash

name="pepperapi"
dpdir=/data/sss/pepper.zmapi.cn

backup(){
backuptime=$(date '+%Y%m%d_%H:%M:%S')
backupdir="/data/backup/$name/$backuptime"
mkdir -p "${backupdir}"
scp $host:${dpdir}/pepperapi.jar ${backupdir}
}

deploy(){
rsync -avz --delete pepperapi.jar ${host}:${dpdir}
ssh -t root@${host} <<EOF
sed -i '/127.0.0.1:8081/s/^.*$/    server 127.0.0.1:8081 down;/g'  /data/_nginx.conf/pepper.zmapi.cn 
nginx -s reload
sleep 7
systemctl restart pepperapi1
while :
    do
        curl -m 3 -sI  "http://127.0.0.1:8081/run/check/" | grep 200
        if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]
            then
            echo "service1 is ok"
            break
        fi
        sleep 3
    done
sleep 3
sed -i '/127.0.0.1:8081/s/^.*$/    server 127.0.0.1:8081 weight=10;/g'  /data/_nginx.conf/pepper.zmapi.cn
sed -i '/127.0.0.1:8082/s/^.*$/    server 127.0.0.1:8082 down;/g'  /data/_nginx.conf/pepper.zmapi.cn
nginx -s reload
sleep 7
systemctl restart pepperapi2
while :
    do
        curl -m 3 -sI  "http://127.0.0.1:8082/run/check/" | grep 200
        if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]
            then
            echo "service2 is ok"
            break
        fi
        sleep 3
    done
sleep 3
sed -i '/127.0.0.1:8082/s/^.*$/    server 127.0.0.1:8082 weight=10;/g'  /data/_nginx.conf/pepper.zmapi.cn
nginx -s reload
EOF
}

host=api
backup

for host in  {api,api2}
do
deploy
done
if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]
    then
    curl "http://water2/run/push/?target=@alarm&msg=pepperapi发布成功"
    else
    curl "http://water2/run/push/?target=@alarm&msg=pepperapi发布失败"
    break
fi

rm -rf ${name}.jar

#!/usr/bin/bash

name="rockrpc"
dpdir=/data/sss/water.zmapi.cn

backup(){
backuptime=$(date '+%Y%m%d_%H:%M:%S')
backupdir="/data/backup/$name/$backuptime"
mkdir -p "${backupdir}"
scp $host1:${dpdir}/rockrpc.jar ${backupdir}
}

deploy(){
rsync -avz --delete rockrpc.jar ${host}:${dpdir}
ssh -t root@${host} <<EOF
ip=$(ip addr |grep inet |grep -v inet6 |grep eth0 | awk '{print $2}' | awk -F "/" '{print $1}')
curl http://water2/sev/set/?s=rockrpc@${ip}:8085,0
sleep 2
systemctl restart rockrpc1
sleep 2
curl http://water2/sev/set/?s=rockrpc@${ip}:8085,1
curl http://water2/sev/set/?s=rockrpc@${ip}:8086,0
sleep 2
systemctl restart rockrpc2
sleep 2
curl http://water2/sev/set/?s=rockrpc@${ip}:8086,1
EOF
}

host=water
backup

for host in  {waterapi,waterapi2}
do
deploy
done
if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]
    then
    curl "http://water2/run/push/?target=@alarm&msg=rockrpc发布成功"
    else
    curl "http://water2/run/push/?target=@alarm&msg=rockrpc发布失败"
    break
fi

rm -rf ${name}.jar
